document.masterDocTitle: Maeridae from the Indo-Pacific: Elasmopus, Leeuwinella gen. nov., Maeropsis, Pseudelasmopus and Quadrimaera (Amphipoda: Crustacea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Maeridae from the Indo-Pacific: Elasmopus, Leeuwinella gen. nov., Maeropsis, Pseudelasmopus and Quadrimaera (Amphipoda: Crustacea)

.—

M. inaequipes

: tab. 1 .

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 47.
Quadrimaera viridis (Haswell, 1880)
4.5 mm, AM P.81500, Norfolk Island, scales 0.1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality.
Clark Island , Port Jackson, New South Wales , Australia .
